direction.raw_text: That was awful, really awful. I'm so sorry, Elena. Elena has somehow worked herself into the cavity of the glove compartment, and is trying to figure out how to extricate herself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Things are really rotten at home. You wouldn't believe how rotten. Janey's sick. She's unstable, I guess... it's not the right time to tell you... but that's it -- it's like I can't make her happy, the boys can't make her happy, she just doesn't -- ELENA Jim, maybe we should just go. I've got to look in on the kids. Paul is supposed to be coming back in from the city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus, let me make it up to you -- I can do better than that, honestly
direction.name: direction
